Game.Name: Face Training
Game.Plot: Created in cooperation with Japanese Beautician & Specialist in the Muscles of Facial Expression, Face Training works on the handheld touch-screen Nintendo DS console, with players using a camera attachment to display their face on one screen, then following the instructions on the second screen to exercise and tone their facial muscles. Six different facial areas; eyes, cheeks, nose, mouth, jaw and neck 15 different guided exercises Check your progress with the calendar function
